cyclone.name: IAN
cyclone.current_location: about 615 mi ESE of Kingston, Jamaica
cyclone.trajectory: Moving west-northwest across the central Caribbean; forecast to turn northwest, cross western Cuba, and then aim toward the Florida Peninsula/Gulf Coast early next week.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Western Cuba (Pinar del Río/Isle of Youth area), then potentially the west coast of Florida

weather_observation.watch_coast: None in effect as of Advisory #1
weather_observation.warning_coast: None in effect as of Advisory #1
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Jamaica, Cayman Islands, western Cuba, and the Florida Peninsula/Gulf Coast
weather_observation.wind: Very low (4%) chance of tropical-storm-force (≥34 kt) winds late in the 5-day period; negligible risk before then.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at Port of Savannah during 5-day forecast window.
weather_observation.rainfall: No significant rainfall expected from TD Nine/Ian at the port during the 5-day period.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would affect port operations in the current forecast window.
